name: Orion the Cuttlefish
description:
The life of a sepia is hard, dolphins never give up. Fortunately, you can camouflage yourself with the environment and even spit ink!

Game developed by CastGames for WeeklyGameJam 128 with the theme "Camouflage"

Collaborators:

Gunnar Clovis - https://soundcloud.com/gunnarclovis

Foike - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHPY5GkXFryjLCOFPNPYZqQ

La vida de una sepia es dura, los delfines nunca dan tregua. Afortunadamente, puedes camuflarte con el entorno ¡E incluso escupir tinta!

Juego desarrollado por CastGames para la WeeklyGameJam 128 con el tema "Camuflaje"
